Text: Remember to bolster yourself with <sheetreference(Action,28,0)> before every battle! That'll get yer foes to notice you nice an' early.
Remember to bolster yourself with <sheetreference(Action,48,0)> before every battle! That'll get yer foes to notice you nice an' early.
Remember to bolster yourself with <sheetreference(Action,3629,0)> before every battle! That'll get yer foes to notice you nice an' early.
Do ye recall how ye built enmity in the last exercise? This time ye'll be testin' that combination on a proper opponent.
I've said this before, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>, but it bears repeatin': yer job is to soak up the pain, an' keep yer mates safe.
An' ye do that by directin' the foe's enmity onto yerself.
If yer ally's still standin' at the end o' the fight, I'll count that as a win!
Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!

Pound yer opponent with yer combination!
Don't let yer ally get hit!

Yer ally's gettin' slaughtered!
Drag the foe's attention onto yerself!
For this exercise, ye'll learn to establish enmity with a ranged attack.
...An' yer <sheetreference(Action,24,0)> technique'll be the tool for the job.
...An' yer <sheetreference(Action,46,0)> technique'll be the tool for the job.
...An' yer <sheetreference(Action,3624,0)> technique'll be the tool for the job.
Rather than blunder into a mob o' nasties, yer better off pullin' a few at a time from a safe distance!
Use <sheetreference(Action,24,0)> to break a chunk away from the group, then grab their full attention with <sheetreference(Action,7381,0)> once they reach ye!
Don't get too close! Ye don't want to fight 'em all at once!
Establish enmity with ranged attacks, and defeat all enemies!
Use <sheetreference(Action,46,0)> to break a chunk away from the group, then grab their full attention with Overpower once they reach ye!
Use <sheetreference(Action,3624,0)> to break a chunk away from the group, then grab their full attention with Unleash once they reach ye!
That's it! Divide and conquer, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!

The rest o' the mob has seen ye!
Yer work's cut out for ye now!
In battle, yer enemies won't care naught for “fair.” Stroll into a pack o' foes, an' yer askin' to get swarmed!
Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
For this exercise, ye'll learn how to build enmity with multiple foes.
Have ye ever tried usin' the <sheetreference(Action,7381,0)> technique? It'll let ye aggravate an entire group of enemies!
<sheetreference(Action,7381,0)> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!
Have ye ever tried usin' the <sheetreference(Action,41,0)> technique? It'll let ye aggravate an entire group of enemies!
<sheetreference(Action,41,0)> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!
Have ye ever tried usin' the <sheetreference(Action,3621,0)> technique? It'll let ye aggravate an entire group of enemies!
<sheetreference(Action,3621,0)> hits every bugger within a circle around ye─make sure yer positioned so ye don't miss anyone!

Did ye not hear me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!?
Use <sheetreference(Action,7381,0)> to hit all three dummies AT THE SAME TIME!

Did ye not hear me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!?
Use <sheetreference(Action,41,0)> to hit all three dummies AT THE SAME TIME!

Did ye not hear me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!?
Use <sheetreference(Action,3621,0)> to hit all three dummies AT THE SAME TIME!
Build enmity with all three striking dummies simultaneously!
Use yer <sheetreference(Action,7381,0)> technique to hit all three dummies at once!
Use yer <sheetreference(Action,41,0)> technique to hit all three dummies at once!
Use yer <sheetreference(Action,3621,0)> technique to hit all three dummies at once!
If ye fail to carry out me instructions five times, ye'll be startin' the exercise over!
For this exercise, ye'll be trainin' against multiple opponents.
Use to gain enmity with a group, just like ye practiced. Be sure that the enemy's only interested in hittin' you!
Use to gain enmity with a group, just like ye practiced. Be sure that the enemy's only interested in hittin' you!
Use to gain enmity with a group, just like ye practiced. Be sure that the enemy's only interested in hittin' you!

Yer ally's gettin' murdered!
Drag the enemy's attention onto yerself!
Fight while building enmity with multiple opponents!
Adjust yer position so that ye hit all yer foes with <sheetreference(Action,7381,0)>!
Adjust yer position so that ye hit all yer foes with <sheetreference(Action,41,0)>!
Adjust yer position so that ye hit all yer foes with <sheetreference(Action,3621,0)>!
Once ye've got the situation under control, ye can start usin' combinations!
Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
For this exercise, ye'll learn to deal with reinforcements.
Sometimes there're latecomers to a battle, so ye've got to stay alert.
If ye notice a new foe arrive, don't give in to panic! Keep calm, an' pick the enemy up with yer usual tools!

Yer ally is takin' a beatin'!
Do what it takes to make the enemy notice ye!
Defeat the enemy while staying alert for reinforcements!
The axeman will call for aid at certain points in the battle! Prioritize takin' down the reinforcements!
Move yerself─and the fight─some distance away! Ye don't want yer ally gettin' hit by them big swings!

There's a new enemy on the field!
Use <sheetreference(Action,24,0)> if ye have to!
Nice work! Now take down that newcomer!

Are they too far away for a combination?
Then reel 'em in with a Shield Lob!

Are they too far away for a combination?
Then reel 'em in with a Tomahawk!

Are they too far away for a combination?
Then reel 'em in with an Unmend!
Once ye've got everyone nice an' close, ye can switch to <sheetreference(Action,7381,0)> to keep that enmity flowin'!
Once ye've got everyone nice an' close, ye can switch to <sheetreference(Action,41,0)> to keep that enmity flowin'!
Once ye've got everyone nice an' close, ye can switch to <sheetreference(Action,3621,0)> to keep that enmity flowin'!

There's a new enemy on the field!
Use <sheetreference(Action,46,0)> if ye have to!

There's a new enemy on the field!
Use <sheetreference(Action,3624,0)> if ye have to!
Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
As you might have guessed, the purpose of this exercise is to teach cooperation.
Your ally will hold the enemy's attention─it is your job to take the foe down!
味方と協力して、敵を討伐できれば訓練合格だよ！
Defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
Attack the same foe as your ally to win the battle!
That's the way, novice! I'll keep him occupied─you concentrate on bringing him down!

Very good!
Now here's a hint about enemy facing!
Your opponent will have a harder time avoiding blows from the flanks or from behind.
There are also certain techniques that perform better when executed from such positions.
When it comes to your place in a party you are the sharp end of the spear.
Simply put, your role is to inflict as much damage as possible, while keeping your own skin intact.
As such, you cannot just attack whichever enemy you please!
If you strike a foe other than one controlled by your ally, then you risk becoming the target of deadly aggression.
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
For this exercise, you will be fighting multiple opponents!
The key to victory is coordination with your comrades─each foe will fall all the swifter under a focused assault!

Pay attention, novice!
Target the enemy engaged by your ally!
Coordinate with your allies and defeat the enemy!
Mark well the opponent your ally has engaged, and attack the same enemy!
Start the fight with the staff waver─such foes are often the most dangerous, but the least robust.
Be sure to attack the same enemy as your ally! Strike the wrong foe five times and you fail this exercise!
That's the way, novice! Once this one's down, we'll move on to the fistfighter!

There's another yet standing!
Don't lose your focus!

He's almost done for!
Grind him into the dust!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
Do you remember the lesson where I had you evading enemy attacks?
This exercise will put that training to the test. You must needs plan your strikes around some fancy footwork!
You must pay attention! Watch for the signs whilst you press the attack!
Engage the axe wielder, but keep an eye out for counterattacks!
Defeat the enemy while avoiding attacks!
If you allow yourself to be hit five times, we will start this exercise again from the beginning!
Well done! Slippery as an eel, novice!

Not bad, aye...
Care to dodge this!?

Victory is within reach!
Be on your guard until the very last!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
This exercise will teach you how to deal with enemy reinforcements.
As the battle progresses, new foes will appear on the field.
These sudden arrivals will target your weakest comrade, so you must be quick to eliminate them!

Your healer is under attack!
Swiftly now! Eliminate the aggressor!

Another enemy has arrived on the field!
Engage this new foe!
Keep an eye peeled for reinforcements, novice!
Defeat the enemy while staying alert for reinforcements!

Excellent!
You handled the situation perfectly!

Here comes another!
Make short work of this skirmisher!
Very good! Now see the battle to its end!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
In this exercise, you will learn to manipulate the battlefield.
During the battle, enemies will pour forth from the rear gate. New foes will continue to flood in whilst this portal remains open.
You must operate the lever that closes the gate, or your party will be overwhelmed!

The reinforcements are without end!
Quickly─use the lever to close the gate!
Manipulate the battlefield and defeat the enemy!
Engage the enemy, but be wary of the gate!
The gate has opened! Ignore the reinforcements for now, and operate the lever!
Well done! The flood of enemies has ceased! Now mop up the foes remaining!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.
Now that you understand what is expected of you, we can continue with the lesson.
The upcoming exercise requires that you keep your ally healed.
When it comes to your place in a party you are the soothing wind of restoration.
When you've healed all there is to heal, there may be time to weave in some offensive magicks.
Heal your ally and defeat the axe-wielding training partner!
Your primary concern should be healing your ally!

But keep an eye on your companion!
You should not be blasting if someone is bleeding!
As such, rather than engaging the enemy directly, your primary role is to focus upon the mending of wounds.
With the support of your diligent healing, your party will prevail against even the most savage of foes!
Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
In this next exercise, you will be healing multiple allies.
You will need to stay alert, and switch your attention between allies as the situation demands.
体力の少ない味方がいます！　急いで回復を！
There's a new enemy on the field! You'll need to keep an eye on the health of both allies!
Maintain the health of your allies and defeat the enemy!
Focus your attention on the well-being of your companions!
Another enemy threatens your party! You might try attacking this foe if your allies are uninjured.
Battle is chaotic, and you must needs learn flexibility.
Thus, you will find yourself in a scenario in which sudden reinforcements threaten your party.
Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
For this exercise, you will learn to heal whilst avoiding harm.
As before, you must watch for signs you are being attacked. Move swiftly, and time your casts to avoid interruption.
If you are hit five times, we shall start again from the beginning!

Pay attention, now!
Dead healers cast no cures!
Well done! Slippery as an eel, novice!

Not bad, aye...
Care to dodge this!?
Stand clear of your companions! An attack that targets you need not threaten them as well!

Victory is within reach!
Be on your guard until the very last!
Defeat the enemy while healing allies and avoiding attacks!
Avoid enemy attacks, and heal your allies!
Success will be a matter of combining lessons already learned!
Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
This is it! The final exercise!
As the culmination of yer trainin', all the skills ye've learned'll be put to the test!
You've arrived at the mountain's peak─the final exercise!
As the culmination of your training, all the skills you've acquired will be put to the test!
And now we come to the final exercise...
As the culmination of your training, all the skills you've acquired will be put to the test.
Right, let's start with the basics! Keep the foe away from yer allies, an' watch yer positionin'!
Let's begin with the basics, shall we? Pay attention to the enemy's facing, and stay out of harm's way!

As always, healing is your primary concern!
Attack only when it is safe to do so!

Ye've got more company!
Establish yerself as the biggest threat!

Watch out for the jackal!
Put it down quickly!

Watch out for the jackal!
Be sure your ally does not fall to its jaws!

More reinforcements!
Take control o' the field! Show 'em who's in charge!

Another jackal!
Spare your healer its jaws!

Another jackal!
Keep an eye on your lightly armored companion!
Ye've handled groups in yer previous trainin'! This's no different!
Now you face multiple foes! Remember to coordinate efforts with your allies!

Now the battle becomes interesting...
You'll need to watch your positioning here.
Defeat the tamed dodo
Defeat the tamed jackals
Defeat the tamed puks
Defeat the tamed goobbue
Yer near the end of it now, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>, but stay focused! This bloke's a bit of a handful...

And now for the last challenge!
This one hits hard, so be quick on your feet!

Your last opponent looms!
This one packs a wallop, so stay on your toes!
Just one more push! Victory is yers for the takin'!

Just a little more, novice!
Keep your focus, and see this foe defeated!

The end is in sight!
Be sure your allies survive the battle!
Breathe deep, remember yer lessons, an' ye'll do fine! Let me know when yer ready to begin.
Put your lessons into practice and you'll do just fine! Say the word when you are ready to begin.
Put your lessons into practice and you'll do just fine! We can begin as soon as you are ready.
Listen up, novice!

Are we clear?
Let me know when yer ready to begin.
This trainin' exercise is now underway!
...Ye've failed this one, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>. Let's chalk it up to experience, an' try again, eh?
...I'm callin' an end to this exercise. Let's chalk it up to experience, an' try again, eh?

An' this concludes the exercise!
Come see me for yer reward.
That's the way!
Defeat every enemy on the field, an' I'll consider yer lesson learned.
Let us proceed directly to the briefing.
Everything is clear, I trust? Say the word when you are ready to begin.
This training exercise is now underway!

I'm afraid you've failed this one, novice...
But, chin up! Practice makes perfect!

I'm afraid I must call an end to this exercise...
But, chin up! Practice makes perfect!

Bravo! And thus concludes the exercise.
Pray come and receive your reward.
You're doing splendidly! Keep it up!
Work with your allies to defeat the enemy, and we can move on to the next training exercise.

Do I have your full attention?
Then let us proceed.

Any questions?
We can begin as soon as you are ready.
This training exercise is now underway!

You've failed this time...
But you begin again knowing what to expect!

I have to call an end to this exercise...
But you begin again knowing what to expect!

Congratulations─the exercise is complete!
Come see me for your reward!
Very nice! You're doing wonderfully!
Provide support, defeat the enemy, and victory will be yours!
That's the way, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!
Aye, ye've got the idea!
Keep to the order I told ye! The combination won't sting the same if ye mix in other techniques!
Well done!

Keep it up, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>!
Yer almost at the end of it!

Your ally is faltering!
You must cast Cure, and swiftly!

Your ally is faltering!
You must cast Physick, and swiftly!

Your ally is faltering!
You must cast Benefic, and swiftly!
Clear the Hell of Howls
Defeat the Sanguine Sirens
Clear the Hell of Malms
Defeat Ymir
Clear the Hell of Waves
Defeat Eynzahr

Welcome, <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Link><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><sheetreference(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)><Else/> </If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><sheetreference(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)><Else/> </If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><sheetreference(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)><Else/> </If></Link> <split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)><Else/><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)><Else/><split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)></If></If>! 
Let's get those maimin' muscles warmed up, shall we?
They never knew what hit 'em... Not that I'm surprised. If a handful o' raptors had given you any trouble, the gods only know what they'd have done to the rest of us!
Dealin' with the unpredictability of fiery brutes like these sharpens the reflexes, so we'll get 'em nice an' angry for ye.
Pick up the pace, soldier! These ain't even the small fry!
Tap into those primeval instincts! Eye o' the coeurl! ...Speakin' o' which—let loose the coeurl!
That's one o' the benefits o' trainin' on this island. No shortage o' creatures ready to rip ye to shreds.
Now yer all nice an' limbered up, we'll let ye loose on some more civilized targets!
Well, I weren't expectin' that. Still...made for interestin' viewin', I must say. From now on, though, you'll be up against the Maelstrom's best.

It's time, Brother!
Don't hold back, now! We'll be the talk of Maelstrom Command if we can leave a scratch on <If(PlayerParameter(4))>her<Else/>him</If>!
If, aye. But I suppose it's too late to back out now... I say we move in tandem and try to overwhelm them.
Quick! Bind them with the iron chain! And watch your footing!
Forgive me, Brother. I couldn't keep up...
Knights o' the Barracuda, to your positions!
No doubt you've heard tales of our skill at arms, adventurer. And now you shall witness it firsthand.
Seven hells... To think I spoke of our skill at arms...

I've long awaited this chance, <If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><Link><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(52),0))><sheetreference(GCRankLimsaMaleText,PlayerParameter(52),8)><Else/> </If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><sheetreference(GCRankGridaniaMaleText,PlayerParameter(53),8)><Else/> </If><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(54),0))><sheetreference(GCRankUldahMaleText,PlayerParameter(54),8)><Else/> </If></Link> <split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)><Else/><If(GreaterThan(PlayerParameter(53),0))><split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)><Else/><split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)></If></If>!
I trust you will show me no favors! Meet me as you would an equal!
\ \ I yield! I yield! By the Navigator... \ \ That was...inspirational!
Expectin' wet-nosed Maelstrom pups, were ye? Then yer in fer a treat! The Sirens are 'ere to give ye a proper drillin'!
We'll do our best not to gut ye, darlin', but once we taste blood, well...old 'abits die 'ard.
Tsk-tsk. Didn't nobody ever tell ye the 'ells 'ave no fury like a Siren scorned? Yer gizzard won't be fit fer the chum bucket when we're through with ye!
Sound the bell o' the Lady Infernal! Make ready the cannons!
Forward battery! Fire!
Abeam, fire!
Cross spread! Fire!
Blast 'em front an' center!
Like that, is it? PAH! All guns! Bombard the bilge-swillin' scrags!
Now that's a 'venturer after me own 'eart! That lust for blood... Oooh, it sets me skin atingle.
Bested the Sirens already? Why, Rhoswen would scarce have had time to swear herself hoarse.
Dear me... Did the Sirens keep you so long? Mayhap you were loath to strike them for fear you might catch something...?
No matter. I am come to test the worth of the Krakens' newest acquisition. I trust you will oblige me...?
You will be shocked to hear that she prefers her prey roasted. Rather sophisticated for a savage beast, wouldn't you say?
You seem to be keeping up with her quite well─thus far, at least. Did I mention that Ymir has hidden talents?
Hmph. 'Twould seem I wasted my coin. Very well. Victory is yours. Be on your way.
I, Eynzahr Slafyrsyn, shall be your final opponent.
Couldn't help myself, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>. Those last few matches stirred something...
You seem to be treading water, Marshal. If I did not know better, I should think you cared naught for our company's good name.
Spare me, Admiral. I hold my duty to the Maelstrom above all else─as you well know. Nevertheless, I will not deny that this uniform now prevents me from doing my worst.
But since all here present are privy to the truth, might we not loosen the collar and hearken back to the glory days, just this once? ...By your leave, o' course.
As you like. 'Twill make for a better spectacle.
Heh. I said I'd never don you again, old friend. But many a man would trade the wisdom of years for a minute of youthful hubris...
Abandon hope, ye fools of fortune, for you face Mistbeard, king of the five seas!

I have drowned a hundred men on their own decks ere they took to sea!
Here, have yourselves a whiff of this!
Aching for the theriac, are you? Let's have a little treasure hunt for it.
Nothin' gets the blood pumpin' like scrappin' with a pack o' ravenous beasties!
Overcome Unsevered Despair
Overcome Unstifled Prayer
Defeat Hraesvelgr
Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!

The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?

A wyrm doth fight with both might and magicks.
Canst thou withstand the onslaught of spell and claw?

This is as far as you go, <split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)>!
You and your ridiculous name won't make it past me, kupo!

This is no time for naps, kupo!
Everyone fights! No one quits!

I'm not chieftain because I'm the biggest...
I'm chieftain because I'm the baddest, kupo!

Kupopo... That's enough... You've made your point.
This isn't a fight to the death, kupo...

Thou hast weathered my trial thus far...but I am not convinced.
I will try thy limits.

Nidhogg will spare thee no clemency.
And thus neither must I.

...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...
Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!

Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?
Come, warrior. Show me what strength doth remain in thy frail mortal shell!

The sky is the domain of dragons.
How wilt thou contend with such mastery?

Thou art formidable...
But canst thou endure until the bitter end?
Fight on, warrior! Press thy attack!

...Thy resolve hath withstood my scrutiny.
Mayhap there is hope to be had in one such as thee...
Pursue the legatus
Defeat Regula van Hydrus

The legatus himself is here!
After him!

I shall contend with this foe.
Press onwards, my comrades!
There! It's van Hydrus!
Wha─ Ah!
I can't─ It's crushing me...
Can't...breathe...
Mistress Krile!
Quickly! Inside the barrier!

My weapon's inhibitors exist for a reason...
But I will not lose to you again!

Magitek enhances my bladework tenfold!
You cannot hope to win!
Forgive me... I thought myself stronger...

Mine eyes grow dim...
Whither now the Light...?
Ugh... I am no warrior, it seems...
No... Not again...

The Garleans strike for the heart of the facility.
And the legatus spearheads their charge.
We must be swift in our pursuit.

Go! I will stand guard over Mistress Krile.
You must keep the legatus from his prize!

We leave her in your care, then.
You'd best keep her safe, Unukalhai!

The central laboratory should be up ahead.
Let's hurry along, shall we?
<split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)>! Krile needs you!
Wriggling maggots! I shall grind you to paste in my jaws!

Come, my children!
Claim the vengeance that is rightfully yours!

Look upon the fool who dared embrace my power!
Witness the darkened wings that beat about his shriveled soul!
Champions of man! Hearken to my fury!
Thy final verse is sung!

Brood-brother, thou hast doomed me...
But if I must meet mine end, then all shall burn upon my pyre!
Slain twice by mortal hands...

All will perish!
All will be consumed by fiery ruin!

Thou hast survived my song...
Curse thee and thine eye, Hraesvelgr!

Will you flee, little mortals?
My talons shall rend your courage; my jaws, taste agony!
Clear the peat bogs
Defeat Arachne Eve
Clear the Shatotto Memorial
Defeat Forgall
Clear the security corridor
Defeat Ozma
Defeat Calofisteri

My dear Yafaem...
What a wretched morass it has become.

Do you spy that wreckage up ahead?
Could it be one of the Talons' downed vessels?

Is this not a tributary of the White Maiden?
We should come upon Mhach if we follow it downstream!
\<cough> \<splutter> I am not terribly fond of water...

We aim for that pyramidal structure, but ware the voidsent.
The air is thick with their otherworldly stench...

Ah, the wonders of Mhachi architecture.
Fifteen centuries and a flood later, and still it stands.

Barring our way is a terrible sphere that has devoured entire cities.
We must prove the stronger if we are to reach the Nullstone.

This is it: the Tomb of the Nullstone.
There will be a guardian. There is always a guardian...
Gaha! There were more of you blood-filled morsels!? How well I will sup this day!

Nasty little insects!
You will not scurry so within my web!

Bah! Not strong enough! Not strong enough!
I must feed on more than flesh!

Are you frightened, my precious prey?
Gaze into my eyes and know true terror!

What manner of prey...bites back?
I must warn...Lord Forgall...

Ah, some of you survived. How convenient.
I am in need of fresh souls to shatter the ward.

\<cough> After so long...I am arisen...
I will not...be buried here...

Even empty husks have their uses.
See how they jerk and dance at my command!
I will teach those who oppose me the extent of their folly...

Your pitiful lives will be mine in due time.
But first, you must be punished for your insolence!

Solitude weakens the spirit and warps the flesh...
Stray from the pack at your peril!

Will you glimpse the realm that awaits you after death?
Drink deep from the chalice of oblivion!

Ah, how sweet the rancid breeze of the underhells...
Its winds will strip you to the bone!

Arise, my rotting playthings!
The board needs more pieces in play!

My undead toys are so easily broken.
Mayhap my minions will prove the sturdier...

How tiresome. I had thought to spare my energies for the ward.
But you insist on gripping to life so very tightly...
Embrace your fate! By my stygian light be your doom revealed!

My lord warned that mortals of power might interfere...
But you are no threat to me! I reign in the court of the void!
Know your slayer, intruders. I am Calofisteri, and by the blood of voidsent have I ascended to the sublime...

Behold my magnificent mane!
These curls are blades that cut, and roots that drain!
Shall I share my luscious locks with you?

Unkempt thieves! Slovenly marauders!
You will not have the Nullstone!

Have you ever witnessed such coifed perfection!?
The edges of my tresses are sharper than swords!
...Why do you yet stand? I have supped on the void! What ungodly power swims in your veins?

Yahahahaha!
My strands will soak in the lifeblood of every last one of you!

Do you dare face the halo of my unleashed glory?
Or turn your back and risk the sting of my rejection?

My pride is clipped... My strength is shorn...
The Nullstone is yours...

Weevils and maggots!
I shall spin another web! Yes! More threads to bind you!

See what you have done!
My poor web is in tatters!

Why must you wriggle so!
You've ruined another web!

Body of rock, from rough stone hewn...
Chipped with chisel and marked by rune...

Mind of spells, engraved instruction...
Given life to wreak destruction...

Core of arcane will ignited...
Made to crush the uninvited...

Departing now, the maker's spark...
A shattered face, stone eyes grown dark...

Well done, well done! But let us see how you fare with this next task!
I see your minds are yet unbroken. One final game, then, to test the limits of your courage!
An impressive performance. You shall have your reward, as promised!
Your resilience is astounding. Here, take your cookies!
But be warned, brave ones: we shall not be so gentle on your next visit!
There are six pumpkin chests hidden around the manor. Find them all to win the game!
Can you find and open the pumpkin coffer? You'll need to call out five numbers to dispel the lock...
Five little numbers...hiding here and there...
I have scribed eldritch patterns on the floors of four rooms.
Only when a mortal stands within each circle will I release you from this task!
Scoop up the smoldering coals and light the jack-o'-lanterns!
You must ignite four before the clock ticks down!
Scour the manor for baskets and claim the treats they hold!
Some baskets hold more and some hold less. Can you find fifteen cookies in time?
Creep around the manor and find the untrapped boxes!
Only two are safe, and there are clues to guide you. You could try trusting your gut, of course...
Pumpkins abound, but only one is a transformed impostor!
Make use of the smoke bombs, and look for that telltale blue...
Welcome to our haunted manor! Complete three of my terrifying tasks, and you shall have a reward!

Reach us, featherless ones cannot!
If you dare, here try to fly! Squawk!

Intrude upon sacred ground, who dares!?
Pay with lives, featherless ones will!
Upon sliver of Her glory, we now call! Squaaawk! Squaaawk!
THE RECKONING COMES!!!
O Lady of the Vortex! In Your name, our lives we give...
To the goddess, all glory! All creation, Her dominion is!
From wrath of mighty Garuda, reprieve there is not! Squaaawk!
The unenlightened come...
Daughter, be the bearer of my wisdom.
Know you the full weight of death.
To me, my faithful.
Even in death there is no release.
Come forth, Scales of Revelation!
I would know the weight of your souls.
Can you bring...equilibrium?
I shall tip back the balance...
Sin must be balanced with suffering.
Where one doth not suffice...
Hear the echoes of truth!
Spread the glory of my Word!
My revelations are lost...
